Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS' AFFAIRS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS' AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes a veterans' bill of rights
Summary: Establishes a veterans' bill of rights; provides sample language for such bill of rights; requires the department of veterans' services to establish and distribute a veterans' bill of rights and to make such bill of rights available on the department's website.
LawCode: Add ยง29-e, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to the establishing a veterans' bill of rights
